com.neoworks.shout
Class Stream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.neoworks.shout.Stream
public class Stream
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds the information for a [Shout|Ice]Cast stream. The information is read from a configuration file.

Author:
Nigel Atkinson (nigel@neoworks.com)
